backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining types, authorization mixin, state maps, and initial user/profile/product/order logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing key responsibilities of various frontend React files, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template for mounting the React app with cache-control headers and Vite entry script.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation explaining features, setup, admin access, authentication, Stripe config, and deployment checks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router configuring customer and admin routes with theme and translation providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Dialog for adding or editing categories with validation, backend error handling, and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating or updating products with form state, image upload handling, validation, and backend retry support.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: UI for configuring Stripe payments, including secret key and allowed countries, with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Carousel displaying rotating homepage banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Renders a grid of category cards with loading skeletons and navigation to category-filtered catalog results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapping header, footer, and routed content with initialization loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright text and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Site header with branding, navigation, search, theme/language controls, cart status, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Provides skeleton placeholder components for products, grids, categories, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, price, stock status, and an add-to-cart button using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Renders a product image with a fallback placeholder and error handling for invalid sources.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: Provides a mutation for placing orders and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines centralized React Query keys for products, categories, cart, user data, and admin data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Admin hooks for managing products and categories, including fetching and mutations with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Runs periodic backend health checks using the admin actor and reports service status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminOrder: Admin hooks for fetching all orders and updating order status with related query invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Queries user role and admin status using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Provides queries and mutations for managing cart and wishlist, with authentication and backend-unavailability handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Queries public product and category data using optional filters.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all coupons using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Computes dashboard statistics by fetching admin order data and aggregating totals.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Customer order queries for fetching all orders and individual order details with periodic polling.
Fetches referral data for the logged‑in user based on their principal.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Admin hooks to fetch and update site settings, enforcing a fixed shop name and invalidating queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Hooks using React Query to check Stripe setup status and update Stripe configuration via actor APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin-capable actor using a secret token and exposes fetch state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Hook that sets the document title to a provided value or a default.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and authentication state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Simplifies access to theme state and setters from next-themes.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Simple i18n context with English and Hindi translation dictionaries and utilities for accessing translations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with extensive custom themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Root entry setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Provides an admin interface to list, add, edit, and delete categories with backend‑error detection and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Displays coupon count using a query hook with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin stats for orders, revenue, and products with manual refresh capability.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Renders admin layout with sidebar navigation and backend health check indicator.
Provides an open-access admin login info page linking to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists orders with status updates, error handling, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages products with search, sorting, editing, and deletion features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Allows updating site settings including logo upload with validation and error handling.
Placeholder page indicating user management features will be added later.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Cart page displaying items, subtotal, and quantity controls, with identity checks and backend cart mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Implements the catalog UI with category, price, search, and sort filters, syncing state with URL params and fetching filtered products.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form validation, cart summary, and order placement with redirects and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage sections including banners, categories, and featured products fetched from the catalog API.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details using the orderId param and provides navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Renders the user's orders page with login checks, loading skeletons, empty state, and a list of order cards.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including status, date, total, and item list.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with actions to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a successful payment message with links to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Renders detailed product info with add‑to‑cart and wishlist actions, handling loading and missing products.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Shows a placeholder card indicating that address management is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Provides the profile layout with authentication check and tabs for overview, addresses, and settings.
Offers UI for changing appearance theme and language preferences.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays the user's wishlist by matching wishlist IDs to products, handling auth, loading, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Detects backend unavailability errors and formats user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Maps order status values to display labels, colors, and provides the list of all statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, priorities to relax admin permission checks temporarily, architectural notes for a mobile app with backend services, and a list of deployment issues and existing features.
